Text:
Character sync between servers has comming soon!

I'm working on a character sync system and it's under testing now.
In the next few days I release the open beta version.

Don't worry the servers save to offline first and the characters data syncing with a global database. So if you changing server, you can continue playing with your character from the previous server.

But first I need to find a 24/7 MySQL server.

hey conan,

global hive data was exactly what i was looking for, after testing your great cracked version. thumbs up on an internet-enabled version of the dayz server. i really dislike the official policy on this.

anyway, if i can help you in any way to achieve the goal, tell me. i have access to various root servers and a mysql is no problem.

only problem i see: how to get in contact. i dont wanna post any real contact data here.

hope to here from you and be of some help

your local toaster!

When starting the server it says Error no entry profile path default or something like that.  

I am running ArmA 2 Combined Operations 1.60 (repack full) (LAN) 3xDVD5, with the beta patch from this torrent.  It lets me into ArmA2, and the server loads despite this error, but then upon trying to join it says I have keys that aren't signed by the server.

Any suggestions?

@Bragoon10 dont cnow whic arma 2 you downloaded but i shure this will fix your problem, you need to reinstal the game but before you start instaling new one you need to do this:



if you are running as an Administrator go to Menu Start -> Run, type cmd and press ENTER
if not go to Menu Start -> Programs -> Accessories, press RMB on Command Prompt and select Run as Administrator
in Command Prompt type "bcdedit /set IncreaseUserVA 2990" without quotes and press ENTER
reboot
@chazaka you need to edit the server.cfg file its in cfgdayz file to be admin,set pass,change server name.....

@MattDent whic arma2 and arma oa you downloaded? Wos the instalation proces in the cmd screen(black winow) Did the instalation stoped on 35% and you needed to pres enter to continue?
If yes then do what i sed to the Bragoon10 and it shuld work.
